--- select_singer_with_column_names.sql
SELECT
  SingerId AS ID,
  FirstName,
  LastName,
  SingerInfo,
  BirthDate
FROM Singers

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 9,
          NameEnd: 17,
          Name:    "SingerId",
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    -1,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 21,
            NameEnd: 23,
            Name:    "ID",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 27,
          NameEnd: 36,
          Name:    "FirstName",
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 40,
          NameEnd: 48,
          Name:    "LastName",
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 52,
          NameEnd: 62,
          Name:    "SingerInfo",
        },
      },
      &ast.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 66,
          NameEnd: 75,
          Name:    "BirthDate",
        },
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   76,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 81,
          NameEnd: 88,
          Name:    "Singers",
        },
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT SingerId AS ID, FirstName, LastName, SingerInfo, BirthDate FROM Singers
